means: （使）变模糊( blur的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The boundaries between history and storytelling are always being blurred and muddled.
sentence.Network_cn: 历史和轶闻的分界向来是模糊而混乱的。

sentence.Network_en: The line between fact and fiction is becoming blurred.
sentence.Network_cn: 事实和虚构之间的界限正变得模糊起来。

sentence.Network_en: The evidence is blurred by central banks' reluctance to reveal their blunders.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于中央银行不愿意公开自己的愚蠢错误，证据并不清楚。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 迷字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 迷津〖 labyrinth;wrongpath〗 迷离〖 blurred;daze〗 迷离马虎〖 muddleheaded〗.
含混（blurred）：指瞬态响应差，立体声声像模糊，凝聚欠佳。 闷声（boxy）：指听到的音乐像从封闭的箱子中发出来的而有些共鸣。
新概念第四册单词总汇[旺旺英语论坛] ... favored 受到偏爱的 blurred 模糊的 academically biased 偏向于书本知识的.
The Greek concentration on geometry blurred the vision of later generations ., 希腊人之专注于几何迷糊了后世好几代人的视界.

list.abs: AE中英文对照 ... Lens Blur → 镜头模糊 Radial Blur → 径向模糊 Reduce Interlace Flicker → 降低隔行扫描闪烁.
AE中英文对照 ... Compound Blur → 复合模糊 Directional Blur → 方向模糊 Fast Blur → 快速模糊.
高斯模糊（Gaussian Blur）是美国Adobe图像软件公司开发的一个做图软件:Adobe Photoshop(系列)中的一个滤镜，具体的位置在： …
PS快捷键_百度百科 ... Radial Blur－（ 径向模糊） Smart Blur－（ 特殊模糊（smart blur）） Accented Edges－（ 强化边缘）.

entry.def: A blur is a shape or area which you cannot see clearly because it has no distinct outline or because it is moving very fast.

example.ex: Out of the corner of my eye I saw a blur of movement on the other side of the glass...
example.tran: 从眼角余光中我看到玻璃的另一边隐约有东西在移动。

entry.def: When a thing blurs or when something blurs it, you cannot see it clearly because its edges are no longer distinct.

example.ex: This creates a spectrum of colours at the edges of objects which blurs the image...
example.tran: 这在物体的边缘形成了一道色谱，使图像变得模糊不清。

example.ex: If you move your eyes and your head, the picture will blur.
example.tran: 如果你的眼睛或头动了，图像就会变得模糊不清。

entry.tran: 使（想法、区别等）模糊；使（想法、区别等）不明晰
entry.def: If something blurs an idea or a distinction between things, that idea or distinction no longer seems clear.

example.ex: ...her belief that scientists are trying to blur the distinction between 'how' and 'why' questions...
example.tran: 她认为科学家们试图模糊“如何”和“为什么”这两类问题之间的区别

example.ex: The evidence is blurred by central banks' reluctance to reveal their blunders.
example.tran: 由于中央银行不愿意公开自己的愚蠢错误，证据并不清楚。

entry.def: If your vision blurs, or if something blurs it, you cannot see things clearly.

example.ex: Her eyes, behind her glasses, began to blur...
example.tran: 她藏在眼镜后面的双眼变得模糊起来。

example.ex: Sweat ran from his forehead into his eyes, blurring his vision.
example.tran: 汗水从额头流到了眼睛里，模糊了他的视线。

sentences.sentence: "sometimes one understood clearly and sometimes the meaning was clouded"- H.G.Wells

auth_sentence.content: A steamy haze blurred the lines of the hills.
auth_sentence.res_content: A steamy haze blurred the lines of the hills.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A steamy haze blurred the lines of the hills.

auth_sentence.content: The lines were blurred, and that's scary.
auth_sentence.res_content: The lines were blurred, and that's scary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The lines were blurred, and that's scary.

auth_sentence.content: When he came to, his vision was blurred.
auth_sentence.res_content: When he came to, his vision was blurred.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When he came to, his vision was blurred.
